text: Para wong kafir mau bakal padha didhawuhi (dening malaikat), "Mara padha ngundhanga brahala kang padha sira sembah biyen, supaya padha nulungi". Wong kafir mau banjur padha ngundang brahalane nanging padha ora mangsuli. Para wong kafir padha sumurp siksa neraka, entek atine. Upama wong kafir mau nalika ana ing donya manut ptedah agama Islam, wis mesthi padha ora sumurup siksa neraka
